subject: Re: TDD Using NetBeans 6.5+ and JUnit.
msgSnippet: David, I m sorry, but I don t fully understand your message (English is not my mother tongue language). My first impression is that there is nothing preventing
messageBody:
David,

I'm sorry, but I don't fully understand your message (English is not my mother tongue language). My first impression is that there is nothing preventing NetBeans from running any test, so you don't need the IDE to create the tests for you. Are you creating and placing the tests in the test folder?
If you give me an example I can try it myself and let you know whether I was successful.
Regards,

Marcelo.
